SocialMediaPosting.headline: Ms. Sara Podvasnik’s Story - Pittsburgh Educator - TodayPGH
SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I hope that pre-k becomes universal so we can close the educational gaps early instead of trying to fix them later on in a child's life…”

– Ms. Sara Podvasnik, Pre-kindergarten Educator @DukeCitySD @IUPedu @CarlowU https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2020/universal-pre-k-closes-educational-gaps-early/
